lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth made a 20-foot birdie putt on the final hole with darkness falling, grabbing a share of the first-round lead in the rain-delayed Colonial in Fort Worth.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Spieth Tied for First in Colonial
headline.main: Spieth Tied for First in Colonial

snippet: Jordan Spieth made a 20-foot birdie putt on the final hole with darkness falling, grabbing a share of the first-round lead in the rain-delayed Colonial in Fort Worth.
abstract: Four golfers share first-round lead at Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial Country Club in Fort Worth; other golf news noted.
